about.title: About Me
about.h1: I am Elderson Luciano Mezzomo, a passionate and creative Frontend Developer,
about.text: with a focus on JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3. With my experience in team leadership and analytical thinking, I bring a unique combination of technical skills and creative problem-solving approaches to the IT industry. My career has taken me from the humanities to my passion for exact sciences and technology, where I gained comprehensive knowledge in frontend development. With continuous education in modern frameworks like React.js, I aim to further develop my technical skills in a dynamic and innovative environment. I am ready to make a lasting contribution to the development of digital solutions while further improving my skills in a dedicated team.

project1.desc: The website for the "Nuray Bal" hair salon in Marburg was developed to present the salon's services and ambiance in an appealing and user-friendly manner.
project1.html: HTML: Use of semantic HTML5 for clear, accessible structure and embedding a video on the homepage.
project1.css: CSS: Flexible techniques with CSS variables for a consistent color and design palette, responsive to different screen sizes. Transition effects for a smooth user experience.
project1.js: JavaScript: Dynamic language switching and customizable header elements to enhance user experience.
project1.conclusion: Conclusion: This project demonstrates my ability to create professional and user-friendly websites using modern web technologies.

project2.desc: Schlafklang is an interactive web application that helps users create a calming sleep environment by choosing a countdown timer, background video, and music to suit their preferences.
project2.html: HTML: Clear structuring of options (timer, background, and music) for intuitive operation.
project2.css: CSS: Minimalist design with dark colors and subtle animations to support a relaxing atmosphere. Flexibility through CSS variables.
project2.js: JavaScript: Volume control and full-screen mode based on remaining time, providing a seamless user experience.
project2.conclusion: Conclusion: Schlafklang showcases my skills in developing interactive and user-centric web applications that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing.

project3.desc: Central CAIXA unites all apps, social networks, and support channels of CAIXA ECONÃ”MICA FEDERAL in one place. The app aims to reduce digital barriers, especially for users with low digital literacy.
project3.html: HTML: Well-structured sections that enable intuitive navigation between apps, websites, and social networks.
project3.css: CSS: Color distinction between installed and uninstalled apps for visual guidance, supported by CSS animations and transitions.
project3.js: JavaScript: Detection of installed apps on the user's device and seamless integration into the respective app stores for downloads.
project3.conclusion: Social Responsibility: This project promotes digital inclusion and facilitates access to essential services for all users.
project3.conclusionFinal: Conclusion: Central CAIXA demonstrates my ability to develop user-friendly and inclusive applications that provide social value.
